Posted By: Ctoaun14 (11/26/2009 7:08:51 AM)

posts.post_content:
"Growers"  
[Protean Hydra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Protean Hydra)  
[Phytohydra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Phytohydra)  
  
Token generators  
[Broodhatch Nantuko](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Broodhatch Nantuko)  
[Saber Ants](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Saber Ants)  
[Sekki, Seasons' Guide](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sekki, Seasons' Guide)  
[Tuktuk the Explorer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tuktuk the Explorer) (if they didn't block him)  
[Rukh Egg](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rukh Egg)  
  
Damage redirectors  
[Coalhauler Swine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Coalhauler Swine)  
[Spitemare](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spitemare) (+ Mogg Maniac, Stuffy Doll, etc)  
  
Misc.  
[Academy Rector](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Academy Rector)  
[Body Snatcher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Body Snatcher)  
[Mindslicer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mindslicer) (good for hellbent?)  
[Act of Treason](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Act of Treason) + other creature-stealers  
  
So there are probably more interactions than people think, but nevertheless pretty slim pickings. Still, I think this is a mediocre rather than horrible card. Obviously not tournament-viable, but you could probably make some funky casual deck using it.
posts.html:
"Growers"

Phytohydra

Saber Ants
Sekki, Seasons' Guide
Tuktuk the Explorer (if they didn't block him)
Rukh Egg

Damage redirectors
Coalhauler Swine
Spitemare (+ Mogg Maniac, Stuffy Doll, etc)

Misc.
Academy Rector
Body Snatcher
Mindslicer (good for hellbent?)
Act of Treason + other creature-stealers

So there are probably more interactions than people think, but nevertheless pretty slim pickings. Still, I think this is a mediocre rather than horrible card. Obviously not tournament-viable, but you could probably make some funky casual deck using it.

posts.post_content: When is it worth it when you have to potentially kill one of your own creatures just to play something that can die to [Incinerate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Incinerate)? I imagine if [Vigor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Vigor) was in the battlefield it would make sense, but other than him I can't think of that many other creatures that would have good synergy with this moloch.
